commit.message:
Rollup merge of #74270 - davidtwco:issue-74086-more-placeholder-type-error, r=estebank

typeck: report placeholder type error w/out span

Fixes #74086.

This PR fixes a regression introduced in rust-lang/rust#70369 which meant that an error was not being emitted for invalid placeholder types when there wasn't a span available.

r? @estebank

verification.payload:
tree 47fcb34f8919723811fa63c413b46998fe966b94
parent 6513578584e00f686dd222b1c4c0cd5c94c95602
parent 5afbc5201c7bf82cadd69a1a0cea49cfe1e41172
author Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com> 1594737551 -0700
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1594737551 -0700

Rollup merge of #74270 - davidtwco:issue-74086-more-placeholder-type-error, r=estebank

typeck: report placeholder type error w/out span

Fixes #74086.

This PR fixes a regression introduced in rust-lang/rust#70369 which meant that an error was not being emitted for invalid placeholder types when there wasn't a span available.

r? @estebank

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+error[E0121]: the type placeholder `_` is not allowed within types on item signatures
+  --> $DIR/issue-74086.rs:2:20
+   |
+LL |     static BUG: fn(_) -> u8 = |_| 8;
+   |                    ^
+   |                    |
+   |                    not allowed in type signatures
+   |                    help: use type parameters instead: `T`
+
+error: aborting due to previous error
+
+For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0121`.
